parameters.name: externalProps
parameters.description: The external props passed to this component. If provided, these props will be merged with the `FormControl` props, with external props taking priority.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Indicates if the form control is disabled.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the form control.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Indicates if the form control is required.

properties.name: aria-describedby
properties.description: The id of the element that describes the form control.
